mapper.insert: INSERT INTO check_item_file(check_item_id, file_id, file_type) VALUES (#{checkItemId}, #{fileId}, #{fileType})
mapper.select:
SELECT cif.id AS id, cif.file_type AS fileType, sfu.origin_file_name AS originFileName, sfu.file_save_id AS fileSaveId, sfu.file_suffix AS fileSuffix FROM check_item_file AS cif LEFT JOIN sys_file_upload AS sfu ON cif.file_id = sfu.file_save_id WHERE cif.check_item_id = #{checkItemId}
AND file_type = #{fileType}
